question: Iyo nta mategeko awugabanya by'umwihariko, umuvuduko ntarengwa ku modoka  zitwara abagenzi mu buryo bwa rusange ni:
Ako kapa ka mpandeshatu gashyirwa mu ntera ingana gute mu muhanda  nyabagendwa?
Amatara maremare y'ibara ryera cyangwa ry'umuhondo agomba nijoro igihe ijuru  rikeye kumurika mu ntera ikurikira ku binyabiziga bifite moteri itarengeje ingufu zigera  kuri sentimetero kibe 125

options: b na c ni ibisubizo by'ukuri
question: Za otobisi zagenewe gutwara abanyeshuri zishobora gushyirwaho amatara abiri asa  n'icunga rihishije amyasa kugirango yerekane ko zihagaze no kwerekana ko bagomba  kwitonda, ayo matara ashyirwaho ku buryo bukurikira :

options: Metero 3 byibura hagati yabo n'iyo nkomyi
Metero 1 byibura hagati yabo n'iyo nkomyi
Metero 1 na cm 55 hagati yabo n'iyo nkomyi
question: Iyo banyuze iruhande rw'inkomyi abanyamaguru bangomba gukikira banyuze mu  muhanda, abayobozi b'ibinyabiziga bagomba gusiga umwanya ufite ubugari bwa

options: Kunyuranaho bibera ibumoso bw'imodoka iri imbere
Kunyuranaho bibera iburyo bw'imodoka iri imbere
question: Kunyuranaho bibera he muri aka kanya?

options: Ni itara ry'icyatsi rishyirwa imbere ku kinyabiziga
question: Ibinyabiziga bikoreshwa nka tagisi, bitegerereza abantu mu nzira nyabagendwa,  bishobora gushyirwaho itara ryerekana ko ikinyabiziga kitakodeshejwe. Iryo tara  rishyirwaho ku buryo bukurikira:

options: ibinyabiziga bimuturuka inyuma umuvuduko bifite n'uburyo bimwegereye
ibinyabiziga biturutse ibumoso bwe n'umuvuduko bifite n'intera iri hagati ye nabyo
ibinyabiziga biturutse iburyo n'umuvuduko bifite ni intera iri hagati ye nabyo
umuvuduko bifite n'intera iri hagati ye nabyo
question: Umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga yakwitondera iki mbere yuko y'injira munzira banyuramo  bazengurutse ?

options: bigira ingaruka gusa kubaturuka mukindi cyerekezo
bishobora gutuma batabona igihe gihagije cyo gushyira mubikorwa icyo  amenyeshejwe
baba bafite igihe gihagije cyo gushyira mu bikorwa ibyo bamyeshejwe
question: Gutinda gutanga ibimenyetso ku muyobozi w'ikinyabiziga ni gute bibangamira abandi  bakoresha umuhanda ?
Umubare w'abagenzi bemewe gutwarwa mukinyabiziga wanditswe mu :

options: Iyo umuhanda umurikiye umuyobozi abasha kureba muri metero 20
question: Amatara maremare y'ikinyabiziga agomba kuzimwa mu bihe bikurikira:

options: Ibinyabiziga biturutse iburyo bifite uburenganzira bwo gutambuka mbere
question: Iki cyapa gisobanura iki ?
Ikinyabiziga ntigishobora kugira amatara arenze abiri y'ubwoko bumwe keretse  kubyerekeye amatara akurikira:

options: Ku gisate kiri iburyo bw'umuhanda gusa
question: Ni hehe byemewe kunyuranaho munzira y'icyerekezo kimwe?

options: Hafi y'iteme iyo hari umuhanda ufunganye
question: Kunyura ku binyabiziga bindi, uretse icy'ibiziga bibiri, bibujijwe aha hakurikira:

Za otobisi zigenewe gutwara abanyeshuri zishobora gushyirwaho amatara abiri,  amyatsa, rimwe riri imbere irindi riri inyuma kugirango zerekane ko zihagaze no  kwerekana ko bagomba kwitonda, Ayo matara agomba kumurika muri metero 100  muri buri ruhande rw'aho zihagarara, agira amabara akurikira

options: Igisubizo cya mbere n'icya kabiri ni ukuri
question: Iyo itara ry'umuhondo rimyatsa rikoreshejwe mu masangano y'amayira ahwanyije  agaciro rishyirwa ahagana he:

options: Umuvuduko munini ntarengwa utegetswe ni 30 km/h.
Umuvuduko muto ntarengwa utegetswe ni 30 km/h
Aho ibinyabiziga bihagarara ni imbere mu birometero 30.
question: Iki cyapa gisobanura iki?

options: Kugendera mugice icyo aricyo cyose kirimo ibinyabiziga bike
Kugendera kugice cy'ibumoso keretse ushaka gusohokera iburyo
Kugendera mu gice cy'iburyo bw'umuhanda keretse ushaka kunyuranaho
Ntagutwarira mu ruhande rw'iburyo bw'umuhanda kuko hagenewe imodoka  ziremereye n'imodoka nini zitwara abantu.
question: Igihe umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga atwaye mu muhanda urombereje w'ibice byinshi  agomba kugendera mu kihe gice cy'umuhanda ?
Uburyo bukoreshwa kugirango ikinyabiziga kigende gahoro igihe feri idakora neza  bwitwa:
